00013 class FCDocument;
00014 class FCDPhysicsMaterial;
00015 class FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric;
00016 class FCDPhysicsShape;
00017 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric> FCDPhysicsParameterContainer;
00018 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDPhysicsShape> FCDPhysicsShapeContainer;
00019 template <class Type> class FCDPhysicsParameter;
00020 
00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsRigidBody : public FCDEntity
00022 {
00023 private:
00024     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntity);
00025 
00026     bool ownsPhysicsMaterial;
00027     FUObjectPtr<FCDPhysicsMaterial> physicsMaterial;
00028     
00029     FCDPhysicsParameterContainer parameters;
00030     FCDPhysicsShapeContainer physicsShape;
00031 
00032 public:
00033     FCDPhysicsRigidBody(FCDocument* document);
00034     virtual ~FCDPhysicsRigidBody();
00035 
00036     // Returns the entity type
00037     virtual Type GetType() const { return FCDEntity::PHYSICS_RIGID_BODY; }
00038 
00039     // Sub-id
00040     inline const fm::string& GetSubId() const { return Parent::GetDaeId(); }
00041     inline void SetSubId(const char* sid) { Parent::SetDaeId(sid); }
00042     inline void SetSubId(const fm::string& sid) { Parent::SetDaeId(sid); }
00043 
00044     // Physics Parameters
00045     FCDPhysicsParameterContainer& GetParameters() { return parameters; }
00046     const FCDPhysicsParameterContainer& GetParameters() const { return parameters; }
00047     size_t GetParameterCount() const { return parameters.size(); }
00048     FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* GetParameter(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < parameters.size(), return NULL); return parameters.at(index); }
00049     const FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* GetParameter(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < parameters.size(), return NULL); return parameters.at(index); }
00050     FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* FindParameterByReference(const fm::string& reference);
00051     void CopyParameter(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* parameter);
00052     void AddParameter(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* parameter);
00053     template <class ValueType> FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* AddParameter(const char* name, const ValueType& value) { FCDPhysicsParameter<ValueType>* p = new FCDPhysicsParameter<ValueType>(GetDocument(), name); p->SetValue(value); AddParameter(p); return p; }
00054 
00055     // Physics Material
00056     FCDPhysicsMaterial* GetPhysicsMaterial() { return physicsMaterial; }
00057     const FCDPhysicsMaterial* GetPhysicsMaterial() const { return physicsMaterial; }
00058     void SetPhysicsMaterial(FCDPhysicsMaterial* physicsMaterial);
00059     FCDPhysicsMaterial* AddOwnPhysicsMaterial();
00060 
00061     // Physics Shapes
00062     FCDPhysicsShapeContainer& GetPhysicsShapeList() { return physicsShape; }
00063     const FCDPhysicsShapeContainer& GetPhysicsShapeList() const { return physicsShape; }
00064     size_t GetPhysicsShapeCount() const { return physicsShape.size(); }
00065     FCDPhysicsShape* GetPhysicsShape(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < physicsShape.size(), return NULL) return physicsShape.at(index); }
00066     const FCDPhysicsShape* GetPhysicsShape(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < physicsShape.size(), return NULL) return physicsShape.at(index); }
00067     FCDPhysicsShape* AddPhysicsShape();
00068 
00069     void Flatten();
00070 
00071     // Create a copy of this physics model, with the vertices overwritten
00072     virtual FCDEntity* Clone(FCDEntity* clone = NULL, bool cloneChildren = false) const;
00073 
00074     // Read in the <physics_model> node of the COLLADA document
00075     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node);
00076 
00077     // Write out the <physics_model> node to the COLLADA XML tree
00078     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00079 };
